Name: Derniere Minute (Last Minute)
Ingredients: 2 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Cognac stirred with rich herbal and heather honey Drambuie, along with aromatised wine. Aromatic bitters add complexity depth.
History: Adapted from a drink created in 2015 by Jakub Bobcek at The Refectory Bar, Plymouth, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Derniere Minute (Last Minute) contains 154 calories
